channel.title: Tanzu Portfolio on ModernApps by VMware Tanzu Home
channel.description: Recent content in Tanzu Portfolio on ModernApps by VMware Tanzu Home

item.title: Getting started with K8S on vSphere
item.description: Goal of this presentation was to get the audience up to speed in deploying & configuring vSphere with Tanzu

item.title: Introduction to the VMware Tanzu Portfolio
item.description: This course provides a high level introduction to the the Tanzu Family of products, the vision for the portfolio, and a brief introduction to each of the products & solutions in the portfolio.

item.title: ModernApps Ninja Hugo Tag and Category Registry
item.description: About this document This Document is the central source of tags and categories that can be used on the modernapps.
